FEDERA TRAE COMMSSION,
Plaintiff
HERIAGE HEALTH PRODUCTS COMPAN
a Colorado corporation
Defendant.
COMPLAIT FOR INJUCTIV AND OTHER EQIDTABLE. RELIEF
Plaitiff, the Federal Trade. Commssion (" FTC" or " Commssion ), through its
undersigned attorneys , alleges as. follows:
The FTC brigs this action pursuant to Section 13(b) of the Federal Trade
Commssion Act (" FTC Act" ), 15. U. C. g 53(b), to secure permanent injunctive relief,
rescission of contracts and restitution , disgorgement of il- gotten gains , and other equitable relief
agait Heritage Health Products Company, for engagig in deceptive acts or practices and false
advertising in connection with the advertising, marketing, and sale of the dietar supplements
Heritage Shark Carilage and Heritage Cat' s Claw, in violation of Sections 5(a) and 12 of the
FTC Act, 15 U.S. C. g.45(a) and 52.JUSDICTION AND VENUE
This. Cour hasjursdiction over the matter pursuant to 15 U. C. gg 45(a), 52 , and
53(b) and 28 U. C. gg 1331 , 1337(a), and 1345.
Venue in the United States Distrct Cour for the Distrct of Colorado is. proper
under 15 U. C. g 53(b) and 28 U. C. gg. 1391(b) and (c).
PARTIES
Plaitiff FTC is an independent agency of the United States Governent created'
by statute. 15 U. C. gg 41- 58.. The. FTC enforces Section 5(a) of the FTC Act , 15 U.
g 45(a), which prohibits unair or deceptive acts or practices in or affecting commerce. The
Commission also enforces Section 12 of the FTC Act, 15 U.C. g 52, which prohibits the
dissemination of false. advertsements. for food, drgs, devices, services or cosmetics in or
affecting commerce. The Commssion may intiate federal distrct cour proceedigs to enjoin
violations of the FTC Act and to. secure such equitable relief, as may be appropriate in e ch case..
15 U.S. C. g 53(b).
Defendant Heritage Health Products Company ("Heritage ) is a Colorado
corporation with its pricipal offce. or place of business at 400 N. Lin Lane, Fort Colli , CO
80524. It transacts , or has transacted , business in ths Distrct and throughout the. United States
through the advertsing, marketing, and sale of Heritage Shark Carilage and Heritage Cat'
Claw, among other products , via flyers and the mternet site ww.heritagehealthproducts. com
Page 2 of 16Defendant Heritage has. engaged in the deceptive acts and practices and the
makg of false. advertisements as alleged below and is liable. for said acts and practices.
COMMRCE
The acts and practices of the. defendant , as alleged herein , are in or affecting
commerce , as "commerce" is defied in Section 4 ofthe FTC Act , 15 U. C. g 44.
DEFENDANT' S COURE OF CONDUCT
Since at least Januar 2001 , and contiuing thereafter , defendant has advertised
promoted , offered for sale , sold, and distrbuted the products Heritage Shark Carilage . and
Heritage Cat' s Claw to the public throughout the United States..
Heritage Shark Cartilage! Carti/ago de Tihuron
Heritage Shark Carilage, known in Spansh as carti/ago de tiburon is a dietar
supplement containing chondroitin sulfate. from purfied shark carilage extract.
10.To induce consumers to purchase Heritage Shark Carilage, defendant has
dissemiated or caused to be. dissemiated flyers and Internet advertisements on English and
Spansh language portions of its website ww.heritagehealthproducts. com. Heritage
advertisements include , but are not lited to , the attached Exhbits A (Heritage flyer), B (shark
carilage section ofthe English language portion of Heritage s website) and C (shark carlage
section of the Spanish language porton of Heritage ' s website), and contain , among other thigs
the following statements or depictions:
Page 3. of 16(EXCERPTS FROM BOTH FLYER AND INTERNT SITE)
Numerous clincal studies have pointed to. the positive effects associated
with chondroitin sulfate preparations (such as. Heritage Shark Carilage).. . .
Kuetter has discovered the potent anti -angiogenic activity of carilage extracts. ..
These- facts suggest that Heritage. Shark Carilage possesses notable anti-
angiogenic action.
. . . This concept is important to understand in connection with shark
carilage and its anti- tuor benefits.. . .. A tuor must continually recrut new
blood vessels simply to keep from witherig away.
Shark carilage has been proven as. an anti-angiogenic agent , as it literally
stares. a tuor of its blood supply. Other inamatory processes such as
arhrtis are also dependent upon rapid growth of blood vessels.. Thus , Heritage
Shark Carlage. can prove very effective in counteractig these angiogenic-
dependent ailments.
Exhbits A (flyer) and B ( ww. heritagehealthproducts. com/englproducts/sharkcarlige. htm ).
(EXCERPTS FROM SPANSH LANGUAGE PORTION OF INTERNT SITE)
Durante los liltimos 20 anos , la investigacion cientifca ha demostrado que
el carilago. de Tiburon puede producir resultados espectaculares en el tratamento del
lupus, herpes, lilceras, curacion de heridas , flebitis, hemolToides , fistulas, pruitis, venasvarcosas, acne, enteritis , colitis, eczemas , psorias, osteo-astrtis. (sic 1 0. artis
reumatoidea y el cancer.
. . . EI Carilago de Tiburon . . . (e) stimula los componentes celulares y
humorales. de nuestro sistema inunolOgico.- . Esto.lo.' hace efectivo. contra
bacterias, virs e inecciones fugales.
. . . . . El Carilago de Tiburon de Heritage es. apto. para las siguentes
aplicaciones:
Modulacion de condiciones inamatorias cronicas.
Modulacion de complicaciones diabeticas secundarias.
Modulacion de desordenes cisticos hiperpliisticos.
Page4 of 16Complicaciones secundaras diabeticas de natualeza vascular y complicaciones
. oculares.
Desempefio muscular.
Modulacion de la metastasis y crecimiento de tuores.
Exhbit C (ww. heritagehealthproducts. comlspnlproducts/sharkcarilge. htm).
(TRASLATION)
Durg the. last 20 years , scientific research has demonstrated that shark
carlage can produce spectacular results in the treatment of lupus , herpes, ulcers
wound healig, phlebitis , hemorrhoids , fistulas, prutis, varcose veins , acne
enteritis, colitis, eczemas , psoriasis , osteoarhrtis or rheumatoid arhrtis , and
cancer..... 
Shark Carilage.. . (sJtimulates the cellular and humoral components
of our imunological systems. This makes. it effective against bacterias , virses
and fugal inections.
. . . Heritage Shark Carilage is apt for the following applications:
Modulation of chronic inamatory conditions. . 
Modulation of secondar diabetic complications... .
Modulation of hyperplastic cystic disorders....
Secondar diabetic complications of a vascular natue and ocular. complications.
Muscular recovery. 
Modulation of metastasis and tuor growth.
Translation of Exhibit C.
Heritage Cat' Claw!Una de Gato
11.Heritage Cat' s. Claw , known in Spansh as Una de Gato is a dietar supplement
contaig a powdered form ofthe plant Uncaria Tomentosa.
12.To induce. consumers to purchase Heritage Cat' s. Claw, defendant has
dissemiated or caused to be dissemiated flyers and mternet advertisements on English and
Page 5 of 16Spansh language portions of its. website ww.heritagehealthproducts. com. The. advertisements
include, but are not limted to , the. attached Exhbits. D (Heritage flyer), E (Cat's Claw section of
the English language portion of Heritage' s website), and F (Cat' s Claw section of the. Spansh
language. portion of Heritage' s. website), and contain , among other thigs , the following
statements or depictions:
(EXCERPTS. FROM THE FL YERJ
Scientific. research has shown that Cat' s. Claw can:
Aid in the treatment of:
Dermatological disorders. 
. PMS.
Viral infections.. . 
AIDS
Arthritis. .Alergic Disorders.
Immunological disorders.
Cancer
Genital Herpes.
Systemic candidiasis
Exhibit D (flyer).
(EXCERPTS. FROM THE HERIAGE INTERNT SITE)
Cat's Claw. . . is a medicinal plant from the Peruvian Amazon Rai
Forest. . . .
. . .. The. alkaloids (in Cat's. Claw J have strong antioxidant properties in addition
to antiviral and anti- inamatory properties.
il an inormal marketing poll performed in Lima , Peru it was found that
30% ofthose polled believeCat' s Claw cures cancer. . . . . Overall , 35% ofthosepolled report that a family member has consumed Cat's Claw for some kind of
illness -, be it rheumatism , gastrtis, for the liver or kidneys , to increase imuntyor a myrad of other ailments.. . . .
Page 6 of 16Some of the many benefits of Cat Claw include:
. Ski Health. .
Joint Health. . 
Maintainig a healthy imune system.
Mild mood changes , cramps, and edema associated with the menstral (sic)
cycle.
Exhbit E (ww. heritagehealthproducts. com/englproducts/catsclaw. htm) .
(EXCERPTS FROM SPANSH LANGUAGE PORTION OF INERNT SITE)
Los experientos inciales de. ( el cientifico austraco , Klaus J Keplinger
con laUfia de Gato , revelaron resultados. positivos en el tratamento de
enfermedades viales. mortales en gatos y corderos. Los estudios humanos de
inecciones de herpes realiados por Keplinger tambien fueron positivos.
Desde la decada de los 70s. hasta el presente , losestudios conducidos en
centros de investigaci6n de Peru , Austra, Alemana , fuglaterra , Hungara e Italia
sugieron que ' la Uncara Tomentosa puede ser beneficiosa en el tratamiento. del
cancer, el sindrome. pre-menstral (irregulardades del ciclo femenino), artis
bursitis, el reumatismo , alergias, ulceras, y otro des6rdenes. El Dr. Brent W.
Davis, D., quien ha venido trabajando. con la Uncara Tomentosa des de hacevaros afos en los Estados Unidos , se ha referido a esta hierba como ' la precursoradel camino , debido a su notable habilidad para limpiar el tracto intestinal
completo y para ayudar a pacientes que padecen muchos des6rdenes estomacales. e
incluyendo el Mal de Crahn , divertculitis , sindrome de. escape del intestino
hemorroides , colitis, fistulas, gastrtis , ulceras, parasitos y desequilibrio de la flora
intestinal.
Donna Schwontkowki , Doctora en Medicina Quiropnictica e fuvestigadora
. . . cataloga a la Una de. Gato como. 'la hierba mas poderosa que aumenta la
imunologia. ' Sus estudios prelimares han revel ado que la Ufia de Gato. se
distingue por su . . .
Habilidad para detener inecciones virales en sus etapas tempranas, es
decir, cuando un individuo. siente que comienza una infecci6n 0 cuando
ya padece de fiebre , agotamento , dolores musculares y garganta irtada.
Capacidad para ayudar a pacientes que son quimicamente ensitivos
dismiuyendo el agotamento. que acompaia a este tipo de problemas y
reduciendo. la severidad de los sintomas.
Page 7 of 16Habilidad para realzar signficativamente la estabilidad emocional , ali
en medio de tension extrema proveniente de problemas personales.
Habilidad para ayudar el cuerpo. a combatir las inecciones en pacientes
con SIDA:
Capacidad para reducir el tamafo. visible de. alguos crecimientos de la
piel, tuores 0 quistes en dos semanas.
En su aclamado libro , Vibrational Healig, el Medico. Richard Gerber
menciona . . . que' (la Una de Gato J ofrece grandes promesas para el tratamiento
de artis cuando se toma intemamente , 0. sea, mediante la preparacion de tes 0
tomando capsulas de la hierba. . . .
Finalente , sugiere que la Una de. Gato. puede ser util en la reduccion de
los efectos secundaros de la radiacion y la quioterapia asociados con la tratamentos de
cancer.
Exhbit F (ww. heritagehealthproducts. comlspnlproducts/catsclaw. htm).
(TRASLATION)
(The Austran scientist , Klaus 1 Kepliger s intial experients with Cat'
Claw revealed positive results in the. treatment of mortal viral sicknesses in cats
and lambs.. Keplinger s human studies of herpes inections also were positive.
Beginng in the 1970s through present- day, studies conducted at research
facilities in Peru , Austra, Gennany, England , Hungr, and Italy suggest that
Uncaria Tomentosa may be beneficial in the treatment of cancer , pre-menstrual
syndrome (iregularties of the femie cycle), arhrtis , bursitis, rheumatism
allergies, ulcers and other disorders... Dr.. Brent W. Davis , M., who. has been
working with Uncaria Tomentosa for many years in the United States has referred
to. ths herb as ' the foreruer of the road' because of its. notable ability to
completely clean the intestial tract and for helping patients sufferig many
stomach and intestinal disorders , includig Crohn' s. Disease , diverticulitis , escape
syndrome of the intestine , hemorrhoids , colitis, fistulas, gastrtis, ulcers, parasites
and disequilibrium of the intestinal flora. 
Page. 8 of 16Donna Schwontkowski , Doctor of Chiopractic Medicine and Investigator
. . . lists Cat' s Claw as. ' the most powerfl herb that increases imunology. ' . Herpreliar studies. have revealed that Cat' s Claw is distiguished for its.. ..
Ability to halt viral infections in their early stages , that is to. say, when 
individual feels. the begig of an infection or when he. is already sufferig
fever, exhaustion , muscle pains , and sore. thoat.
Capacity to. help patients that are chemically sensitive , decreasing the pain that
accompanes this tye of problem and reducing the severity of the. symptoms.
Abilty to signficantly brig about emotional stabilty, even in the. middle. of
extreme tension arsing from personal problems.
Abilty to. help the body combat the. inections. in patlents with AIS.
Capacity to reduce the visible size of some. ski growths , tuors or cysts in two
weeks.
il his acclaied book , Vibrational Healing, Dr. Richard Gerber , mentions
. . . that' (Cat' s Claw I offers great promise for the treatment of arhrtis when
taken internally, for instance , by preparng it in tea or takg the. herb in capsule
form.....
Finally, it has been suggested that Cat' s Claw can be useful in reducing the
secondar effects of radiation and chemotherapy associated with the. treatment 
cancer.
Translation of Exhibit F.
DEFENDANT' S VIOLATIONS OF. THE. FTC ACT
13.Section 5(a) of the FTC Act , 15 U.C. g 45(a), prohibits unai or deceptive acts
or practices in or affectig commerce. Section 12(a) of the. FTC Act , 15. U.C. g 52(a), prohibits
the dissemiation of any false advertisement in or affectig commerce for the purose of
inducing, or which is. liely to induce , the purchase of food , drgs, devices, services or cosmetics.
For the. puroses of Section 12 of the FTC Act , Heritage Shark Cartilage and Heritage
Page 9 of 16Cat's. Claw are either a " food" or "drg" as defied in Section 15(b) and (c) of the FTC Act
15 U. . 55(b)and (c).
14.As. set forth below , the defendant has engaged in unawful practices in violation of
Sections 5(a) and 12 of the. FTC Act , 15 U.C. g 45(a) and 52 ,. in connection with the marketig
and sale of Heritage Shark Carilage and Heritage Cat's Claw.
COUNT ONE
Unsubstantiated Claims Regarding the Health Benefits of Heritage Shark Cartilage
15.Through the means. described in Paragraph 10 , defendant has represented
expressly or by implication , that:
fugestion of Heritage ' s -shark carilage is an effective treatment for lupus , herpes
ulcers, wound healing, phlebitis , hemorrhoids , fistulas, pruitis, varcose veins , acne
enteritis, colitis, eczema, psoriasis , rheumatoid arhrtis , and cancer;
Ingestion of Heritage hark carilage is an effective treatment for bacterial
ftgal, and vial infections; and
fugestion of Heritage s shark carilage is an effective treatment for chronic
inamatory conditions , secondar diabetic vascular , ocular, and other complications
hyperplastic cystic disorders , and tumor growt and metastasis. .
16.Though the. means described in Paragraph 10 , defendant has represented
expressly or by implication , that it possessed and relied upon a reasonable basis that substantiated
the representations. set forth in Paragraph 15 at the tie the representations were made.
Page 10 of 1617. In fact, defendant did not possess and rely upon a reasonable basis that
substantiated the representations set forth in Paragraph 15. at the time. the. representations were
made. Researchers generally believe that some substance in shark and bovie carilage may
inbit blood vessel formation necessar to fush oxygen and other nutrents. to cancer cells.. To
date, however , all verified anal and human studies involving oral or rectal admstration of
shark carlage have failed to demonstrate anti-cancer effectiveness. Nor has defendant produced
substantiation for its other health claims regarding the other conditions and illnesses referred to
in the advertisements. Therefore , the makg of the representation set forth in Paragraph 16
constitutes a deceptive practice , and the makg of a false advertisement , in or affectig
commerce , in violation of Sections 5(a) and 12 ofthe FTC Act , 15 U. C. gg 45(a) and 52.
COUNT TWO
False Establishment Claim for. Heritage Shark Cartilage
18.Through the means. described in Paragraph 10 , defendant has represented
expressly or by implication , that scientific research establishes that ingestion of shark carlage. is
effective in the treatment oflupus , herpes, ulcers, wound healing, phlebitis , hemorrhoids
fistulas, pruitis, varcose. veins , acne, enteritis , colitis, eczema, psoriasis, osteoarhrtis
rheumatoid artis , and cancer.
19. il fact, scientific research does not establish that ingestion of shark carilage is
effective in the treatment of lupus , herpes, ulcers, wound healing, phlebitis , hemorrhoids
fistulas, pruitis, varcose. veins , acne, enteritis, colitis, eczema, psoriasis, osteoarhrtis
rheumatoid artis , and cancer.. Therefore , the makg ofthe representation set forth in
Page 11 of 16Paragraph 18 constitutes a deceptive practice , and the makng of a false advertisement , in or
affecting commerce , in violation ofSectioll. 5(a) and 12 of the FTC Act , 15 US. C. gg 45(a)
and 52.
COUNT THRE
Unsubstantiated Claims Regarding the Health Benefits of Heritage Cat' s Claw
20.Through the mean described in Paragraph 12 , defendant has represented
expressly or by implication , that:
fugestion of Heritage Cat' s. Claw is an effective treatment for herpes , Crohn'
Disease, diverticulitis , escape syndrome of the intestine , hemorrhoids , colitis, fistulas
gastrtis, ulcers, parasites, disequilibriun of the. intestinal flora , viral infections
dermatological disorders , pre-menstral syndrome AIS and infections in patients with
AIS, osteo- and rheumatoid arhrtis , allergic and imunological disorders , cancer, and
systemic candidiasis;
fugestion of Heritage Cat' s Claw is or is likely to be an effective treatment for
bursitis and for the secondar effects of radiation and chemotherapy associated with the
treatment of cancer; and
fugestion of Heritage Cat' s Claw reduces the. visible size of some. ski growths
tuors or cysts in two weeks.
21.Through the mean described in Paragraph 12 , defendant has represented
expressly or by implication , that it possessed and relied upon a reasonable basis that substantiated
the. representations set forth in Paragraph 20 at the time the representations were made.
Page 12 of 1622.In fact, defendant did not possess and rely upon a reasonable basis that
substantiated the. representations set forth in Paragraph 20 at the time. the representations were
made... Defendant has produced no well-controlled scientific. studies involvig human subjects
showig that:
fugestion of Heritage Cat' s Claw is an effective. treatment for herpes , Crohn'
Disease, diverticulitis , escape syndrome ofthe. intestine , hemorrhoids , colitis, fistulas, .
gastrtis, ulcers, parasites , disequilibrium of the intestinal flora , viral inections
dennatological disorders , pre-menstral syndrome AIS and infectio s in patients with
AIS, osteo- and rheumatoid arhrtis , alergic and imunological disorders , cancer, and
systemic candidiasis;
fugestion of Heritage Cat' s Claw is. or is. likely to. be an effective treatment for
bursitis and for the secondar effects of radiation and chemotherapy associated with the
treatment of cancer; and
fugestion ofHeritage Cat's Claw reduces the. visible. size of some skin growths
tuors. or cysts in two weeks.
Therefore , the. makg of the. representation set fort in Paragraph 21 constitutes a deceptive
practice, and the makg of a false adverisement , in or affectig commerce , in violation of
Sections Sea) and 12 of the FTC Act , 15 US.C. gg 45(a) and 52.
Page. 13. of 16COUNT FOUR
False Establishment Claim for Heritage Cat' s Claw
23.Through the means described in Paragraph 12 , defendant has represented
expressly or by implication , that scientific research establishes that ingestion of Cat' s Claw is an
effective treatment for herpes , viral inections , dermatological disorders , pre-menstral
syndrome, vial inections , AIS, osteo- . and rheumatoid arhrtis , allergic and imunological
disorders , cancer,. and systemic candidiasis.
24.In fact, scientific research does not establish that ingestion ofCat' s Claw is an
effective treatment for herpes , vial inections , dermatological disorders , pre-menstral
syndrome, vial inections , AIS , osteo- and rheumatoid artis , allergic and imunological
disorders , cancer, and systemic candidiasis. Therefore , the makg of the representation set forth
in Paragraph 23 constitutes a deceptive practice , and the makng of a false advertisement , in or
affecting commerce , in violation of Sections 5(a) and 12 of the FTC Act , 15 US. C.. gg.45(a)
and52.
CONSUMER INJUY
25.. Defendant' s law violations have injured consumers throughout the United States.
fu addition , defendant has been unjustly enrched as a result of its unawfu practices. Absent
injunctive relief by ths Cour , defendant is likely to continue to injure consumers , reap unust
enrchment , and har the public. interest.
26.Section 13(b) ofthePTC Act , 15 US.C. g 53(b), empowers this Cour to grant
injunctive and other relief as. the Cour may deem appropriate to prevent and remedy any
Page 14 of 16violations of the FTC Act. . The Cour , in the. exercise of its equitable jurisdiction , may award
other ancilar relief , includig consumer redress , disgorgement , and restitution , to prevent and
remedy injur caused by defendant's law violations.
PRAYER FOR RELIEF
WHREFORE , Plaintiff FTC requests that this Cour , as authorized by Section 13(b) of
the FTC Act , 15 U.C. g 53(b), and pursuant to its own equitable powers:
Enjoin defendant prelimiarly and permanently from violating Sections 5(a) and
12 of the FTC Act, as alleged herein , in connection with the offer , sale, advertising, or other
promotion or distrbution of any food , drg, dietar supplement , device, cosmetic , or other
product, service, or program;
Award such equitable relief as the. Cour finds necessar to redress. injur to
consumers resulting from defendant's violations of Sections 5(a) and 12 of the FTC Act
including but not limted to rescission of contracts and restitution , and the disgorgement of il-
gotten gains by the defendant; and
Award the. plaintiff the costs of brigig this action , as well as. such additional
equitable relief as the. cour may determejust and proper.

Spanish:Cartago de Tiburon de Heritage es un suplemento nutritivo para adultos.
La administracion oral y topica del cartHago ha probado que no es toxico ni
mutigeno. Sin embargo, no deben tom ariD las madres que estan lactando,
las mujeres embarazadas, IDS niios 0 las personas que necesitan reconstrir
vasos sangufneos (por ejemplo, de c:rugia reciente 0 pacientes cardiacos). 
Shark CartHage is a nutrtional supplement for adults. Or and topicaladstrtion of carlage has proven to be neither toxic nor mutagenc.
Carlage should not, however, be taen by nuring mother , pregnant women
children, or people who need to rebuild blood vessels (i.e. recent surger or hear
patients).
Durante 105 ultimos 20 an os, la investigacion cientifica ha demostrado que el
cartlago de Tiburon puede produeir resultados espectaculares en el
tratamiento del lupus, herpes, ulceras, euraeion de heridas, Debiti,
hemorroides, fistulas, pruits, venas varieosas , acne, enteritis, colitis,
eaemas, psorias, osteo-astritis (sic) 0 artritis reumatoidea yel cancer.
Durg the last 20 year, scientific research has demonstrted that shark carlage
can produce spectacular results in the treatment of Lupus, Herpes, ulcer, wound
healing, flebitis, hemorrhoids, fistulas , prutis, varcose veins, . acne, entertis,
colitis, eczemas , psoriasis, osteoarotis 0 rheumatoid artis , and cancer.
EI Cartlago de Tiburon de Heritage, es un complejo mueopolisacArido-
proteinico Beldo, que ademas contiene colageno y glucosaminoglicanos, 
ineluyendo sulfatos conoritinos A, B y C. Estos son 105 componentes de todos
los cartagos de tibur6n.
EI Cartago de Tibur6n:
a) Contiene un factor anti-angiogenesis que desconecta el crecimiento de
vasos sanguineos de los tumores.
b) Es uno de los antlgenos anti- inDamatorios con sustancias curativas de
heridas mAs potentes.
c) Estimula los componentes eelulares y humorales de nuestro sistema
inmunol6gico. Esto 10 hace efectivo contra bacterias, vis e infeccciones
fungales.
